3. Search (2)

Uninformed Search Algorithms (ë¹„ì •ë³´ íƒìƒ‰ ì•Œê³ ë¦¬ì¦˜)

Depth-First Search Algorithm (ê¹Šì´ ìš°ì„  íƒìƒ‰ ì•Œê³ ë¦¬ì¦˜)

  • í”„ë¡ í‹°ì–´(frontier)ì—ì„œ í•­ìƒ ê°€ì¥ ê¹Šì€ ë…¸ë“œ(deepest node)ë¥¼ í™•ì¥(expand)í•˜ëŠ” íƒìƒ‰ ì•Œê³ ë¦¬ì¦˜
  • ê´€ë ¨ ìë£Œ êµ¬ì¡°: Stack (Last-in, First-out (LIFO))

Breadth-First Search Algorithm (ë„ˆë¹„ ìš°ì„  íƒìƒ‰ ì•Œê³ ë¦¬ì¦˜)

  • ê´€ë ¨ ìë£Œ êµ¬ì¡°: Queue (First-in, First-out (FIFO))

A* Search (ì—ì´ ìŠ¤íƒ€ íƒìƒ‰)

A* Searchì˜ ìµœì ì„± (Optimality of A* Search)

Minimax Value (ë¯¸ë‹ˆë§¥ìŠ¤ ê°’)

  • ë”°ë¼ì„œ, MINIMAX(s)\text{MINIMAX}(s)MINIMAX(s):

MINIMAX(s)={UTILITY(s)ifÂ TERMINAL(s)maxâ¡aâˆˆACTIONS(s)MINIMAX(RESULT(s,a))ifÂ PLAYER(s)=MAXminâ¡aâˆˆACTIONS(s)MINIMAX(RESULT(s,a))ifÂ PLAYER(s)=MIN\text{MINIMAX}(s) = \begin{cases} \text{UTILITY}(s) & \text{if } \text{TERMINAL}(s) \\ \max_{a \in \text{ACTIONS}(s)} \text{MINIMAX}(\text{RESULT}(s, a)) & \text{if } \text{PLAYER}(s) = \text{MAX} \\ \min_{a \in \text{ACTIONS}(s)} \text{MINIMAX}(\text{RESULT}(s, a)) & \text{if } \text{PLAYER}(s) = \text{MIN} \end{cases} MINIMAX(s)=â©â¨â§â€‹UTILITY(s)maxaâˆˆACTIONS(s)â€‹MINIMAX(RESULT(s,a))minaâˆˆACTIONS(s)â€‹MINIMAX(RESULT(s,a))â€‹ifÂ TERMINAL(s)ifÂ PLAYER(s)=MAXifÂ PLAYER(s)=MINâ€‹

Alpha-Beta Pruning (ì•ŒíŒŒ-ë² íƒ€ ê°€ì§€ì¹˜ê¸°)

  • Alpha-beta pruningì€ ë‘ ê°œì˜ ì¶”ê°€ ë§¤ê°œë³€ìˆ˜ Î±\alphaÎ±ì™€ Î²\betaÎ²ì—ì„œ ì´ë¦„ì„ ë”°ì˜´.

  • Algorithm (ì•Œê³ ë¦¬ì¦˜)
